messages.content: Hi Sarah! Great to speak with you again about QuicTest Solutions. I know you're in Florida and working on your corporation. Since we covered your brand identity last time, let's talk about setting up your business operations.
Yes, I'm ready to set up banking. I'd prefer Chase Bank for business banking.
Excellent choice! Chase has great business banking options. What about accounting software?
I think QuickBooks would work well for my needs. I expect medium volume - maybe 30-40 transactions per month.
Perfect! For tax structure, since you're forming a corporation, would you like S-Corp election for tax savings?
Yes, S-Corp status makes sense. I want to minimize taxes while growing the business.
